member.name: T:Mjr.FeatureDriven.net4.Api.Infrastructure.Routing.NamespaceHttpControllerSelector
member.summary: Controller selector implementation that uses the controller namespace as part of the selection decision.
member.remarks: Largely inspired by sample located at: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/webdev/archive/2013/03/08/using-namespaces-to-version-web-apis.aspx
